short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record user traces for research experimentation purpose.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We are running a research experiment with the objective to generate tests from user's profile. We therefore need several user's profile, and will be happy if you can participate to create some of them.
